front.title: A Bound End-to-End Tunnel (BEET) mode for ESP

abstract.t: This document specifies a new mode, called Bound End-to-End Tunnel(BEET) mode, for IPsec ESP. The new mode augments the existing ESPtunnel and transport modes. For end-to-end tunnels, the new modeprovides limited tunnel mode semantics without the regular tunnelmode overhead. The mode is intended to support new uses of ESP,including mobility and multi-address multi-homing.
